functionDecorators.name: actualClaimLength
functionDecorators.description: Gets the Number of all the Claims created till date.

functionDecorators.name: addClaim
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new claim.

functionDecorators.name: addClaimVoteCA
functionDecorators.description: Stores the id of the claim assessor vote given to a claim. Maintains record of all votes given by all the CA to a claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _claimId
parameterDecorators.description: Claim Id to which vote has given by the CA.

functionDecorators.name: addClaimVotemember
functionDecorators.description: Stores the id of the member vote given to a claim. Maintains record of all votes given by all the Members to a claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _claimId
parameterDecorators.description: Claim Id to which vote has been given by the Member.

functionDecorators.name: addVote
functionDecorators.description: Add Vote's details of a given claim.

functionDecorators.name: callClaimEvent
functionDecorators.description: Calls Claim Event.

functionDecorators.name: callVoteEvent
functionDecorators.description: Calls Vote Event.

functionDecorators.name: changeDependentContractAddress
functionDecorators.description: Iupgradable Interface to update dependent contract address.

functionDecorators.name: changeFinalVerdict
functionDecorators.description: Sets the final vote's result(either accepted or declined)of a claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _verdict
parameterDecorators.description: 1 if claim is accepted,-1 if declined.

functionDecorators.name: changeMasterAddress
functionDecorators.description: change master address.

functionDecorators.name: getAllClaimsByAddress
functionDecorators.description: Gets all Claims created by a user till date.

functionDecorators.name: getAllClaimsByIndex
functionDecorators.description: Gets the Claim's details of given claimid.

functionDecorators.name: getAllVoteLength
functionDecorators.description: Gets the count of all votes.

functionDecorators.name: getAllVotesForClaim
functionDecorators.description: Gets Id of all the votes given to a claim.

functionDecorators.name: getCaClaimVotesToken
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total number of votes cast as Claims assessor for/against a given claim.

functionDecorators.name: getClaim
functionDecorators.description: Provides information of a Claim when given its claim id.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimCoverId
functionDecorators.description: Gets cover id of a claim.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimDateUpd
functionDecorators.description: Gets the last update date of a claim.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimFromNewStart
functionDecorators.description: Gets details of a claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: claim id = pending claim start + given index.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimLength
functionDecorators.description: Calculates number of Claims that are in pending state.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimMVote
functionDecorators.description: Gets total number of tokens staked during voting by Members.

parameterDecorators.name: _verdict
parameterDecorators.description: 1 to get total number of accept tokens, -1 to get total number of deny tokens.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimOfEmergencyPauseByIndex
functionDecorators.description: Get claim queued during emergency pause by index.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimState12Count
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of tries that have been made for a successful payout of a Claim.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimStatusNumber
functionDecorators.description: Gets the status number of a given claim.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimVote
functionDecorators.description: Gets total number of tokens staked during voting by Claim Assessors.

parameterDecorators.name: _verdict
parameterDecorators.description: 1 to get total number of accept tokens, -1 to get total number of deny tokens.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimVoteLength
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total number of votes of a given claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _ca
parameterDecorators.description: if 1: votes given by Claim Assessors to a claim, else returns the number of votes of given by Members to a claim.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimsTokenCA
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of tokens that has been locked while giving vote to a claim by Claim Assessors.

functionDecorators.name: getClaimsTokenMV
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of tokens that have been locked while assessing a claim as a member.

functionDecorators.name: getFinalVerdict
functionDecorators.description: Gets the Final result of voting of a claim.

functionDecorators.name: getFirstClaimIndexToStartVotingAfterEP
functionDecorators.description: Gets the index from which claim needs to be reopened when emergency pause is swithched off.

functionDecorators.name: getFirstClaimIndexToSubmitAfterEP
functionDecorators.description: Gets the index from which claim needs to be submitted when emergency pause is swithched off.

functionDecorators.name: getLengthOfClaimSubmittedAtEP
functionDecorators.description: Get number of Claims queued for submission during emergency pause.

functionDecorators.name: getLengthOfClaimVotingPause
functionDecorators.description: Gets number of Claims to be reopened for voting post emergency pause period.

functionDecorators.name: getMemberClaimVotesToken
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total number of tokens cast as a member for/against a given claim.

functionDecorators.name: getPendingClaimDetailsByIndex
functionDecorators.description: Gets claim details to be reopened for voting after emergency pause.

functionDecorators.name: getRewardStatus
functionDecorators.description: Gets the reward percentage to be distributed for a given status id.

parameterDecorators.name: statusNumber
parameterDecorators.description: the number of type of status.

functionDecorators.name: getTokensClaim
functionDecorators.description: Gets Number of tokens deposit in a vote using Claim assessor's address and claim id.

functionDecorators.name: getUintParameters
functionDecorators.description: Gets Uint Parameters by parameter code.

functionDecorators.name: getUserClaimByIndex
functionDecorators.description: Gets details of a claim of a user at a given index.

functionDecorators.name: getUserClaimCount
functionDecorators.description: Gets total number of Claims created by a user till date.

functionDecorators.name: getUserClaimVoteCA
functionDecorators.description: Gets the vote id of a given claim of a given Claim Assessor.

functionDecorators.name: getUserClaimVoteMember
functionDecorators.description: Gets the vote id of a given claim of a given member.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: index to get voteid in CA.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: index to get voteid in member vote.

functionDecorators.name: getVoteDetails
functionDecorators.description: Provides information of a vote when given its vote id.

functionDecorators.name: getVoteToken
functionDecorators.description: Gets the Number of tokens of a vote using claim id and index.

parameterDecorators.name: _ca
parameterDecorators.description: 1 for vote given as a CA, else for vote given as a member.

functionDecorators.name: getVoteVerdict
functionDecorators.description: Gets the verdict of a vote using claim id and index.

parameterDecorators.name: _ca
parameterDecorators.description: 1 for vote given as a CA, else for vote given as a member.

functionDecorators.name: getVoteVoter
functionDecorators.description: Gets the Voter's address of a vote using claim id and index.

parameterDecorators.name: _ca
parameterDecorators.description: 1 for vote given as a CA, else for vote given as a member.

functionDecorators.name: getVoterVote
functionDecorators.description: Gets the voter's address of a given vote id.

functionDecorators.name: setClaimAtEmergencyPause
functionDecorators.description: Queues Claims during Emergency Pause.

parameterDecorators.name: percCA
parameterDecorators.description: reward Percentage reward for claim assessor.

functionDecorators.name: setClaimStatus
functionDecorators.description: Sets status of a claim.

functionDecorators.name: setClaimSubmittedAtEPTrue
functionDecorators.description: Set submission flag for Claims queued during emergency pause. Set to true after EP is turned off and the claim is submitted .

functionDecorators.name: setClaimTokensCA
functionDecorators.description: Stores the tokens locked by the Claim Assessors during voting of a given claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _vote
parameterDecorators.description: 1 for accept and increases the tokens of claim as accept, -1 for deny and increases the tokens of claim as deny.

functionDecorators.name: setClaimTokensMV
functionDecorators.description: Stores the tokens locked by the Members during voting of a given claim.

parameterDecorators.name: _vote
parameterDecorators.description: 1 for accept and increases the tokens of claim as accept, -1 for deny and increases the tokens of claim as deny.

functionDecorators.name: setClaimdateUpd
functionDecorators.description: Sets the timestamp of a given claim at which the Claim's details has been updated.

parameterDecorators.name: _claimId
parameterDecorators.description: Claim Id of claim which has been changed.

parameterDecorators.name: _dateUpd
parameterDecorators.description: timestamp at which claim is updated.

functionDecorators.name: setFirstClaimIndexToStartVotingAfterEP
functionDecorators.description: Sets the index from which claim needs to be reopened when emergency pause is swithched off.

functionDecorators.name: setFirstClaimIndexToSubmitAfterEP
functionDecorators.description: Sets the index from which claim needs to be submitted when emergency pause is swithched off.

functionDecorators.name: setPendingClaimDetails
functionDecorators.description: Sets the pending vote duration for a claim in case of emergency pause.

functionDecorators.name: setPendingClaimVoteStatus
functionDecorators.description: Sets voting flag true after claim is reopened for voting after emergency pause.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardClaimed
functionDecorators.description: Sets the reward claim status against a vote id.

parameterDecorators.name: claimed
parameterDecorators.description: true if reward for vote is claimed, else false.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardDistributedIndexCA
functionDecorators.description: Updates the max vote index for which claim assessor has received reward.

parameterDecorators.name: caIndex
parameterDecorators.description: last index till which reward was distributed for CA.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardDistributedIndexMV
functionDecorators.description: Updates the max vote index for which member has received reward.

parameterDecorators.name: mvIndex
parameterDecorators.description: last index till which reward was distributed for member.

functionDecorators.name: setUserClaimVoteCA
functionDecorators.description: Sets the id of the vote.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: Claim assessor's address who has given the vote.

parameterDecorators.name: _claimId
parameterDecorators.description: Claim Id for which vote has been given by the CA.

parameterDecorators.name: _voteid
parameterDecorators.description: Vote Id which will be stored against the given _from and claimid.

functionDecorators.name: setUserClaimVoteMember
functionDecorators.description: Sets the id of the vote.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: Member's address who has given the vote.

parameterDecorators.name: _claimId
parameterDecorators.description: Claim Id for which vote has been given by the Member.

parameterDecorators.name: _voteid
parameterDecorators.description: Vote Id which will be stored against the given _from and claimid.

functionDecorators.name: setUserClaimVotePausedOn
functionDecorators.description: Used to pause claim assessor activity for 3 days.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: Member address whose claim voting ability needs to be paused.

functionDecorators.name: setpendingClaimStart
functionDecorators.description: Updates the pending claim start variable, the lowest claim id with a pending decision/payout.

functionDecorators.name: updateState12Count
functionDecorators.description: Increases the count of failure until payout of a claim is successful.

functionDecorators.name: updateUintParameters
functionDecorators.description: Updates Uint Parameters of a code.

parameterDecorators.name: code
parameterDecorators.description: whose details we want to update.
